title: Enhancing Healthcare Practice Competencies: Program for Deepening Mathematical Concepts and Increasing Engagement through Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (equations, functions, introductory statistics)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more complex mathematical problem-solving strategies through group projects
Learners can collaboratively present mathematical modeling processes with peers using role-play activities
Learners can evaluate and provide feedback on group members' contributions using a 4-level scale with peer assessment rubrics
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
